original_text: However, I admit that I worship the God of our ancestors as a follower of the Way, which they call a sect. I believe everything that is in accordance with the Law and that is written in the Prophets,
korean_text: 그러나 이것을 당신께 고백하리이다 나는 그들이 이단이라 하는 도를 따라 조상의 하나님을 섬기고 율법과 선지자들의 글에 기록된 것을 다 믿으며

sentences.original_text: that I worship the God of our ancestors
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 우리 조상들의 하나님을 경배한다는 것을

sentences.original_text: as a follower of the Way
that is in accordance with the Law
and that is written in the Prophets
